name: UNTOUCHABLE (itch)
description:
The parry is the coolest move in many action and fighting games, but what if it was the only move available to you?

Rhythm-based 2D action game made in GameMaker 2. The Untouchable is trying to peacefully complete his journey, but is constantly ambushed in various locations (stages (only one at the moment)). Non-violently defeat them ninja by showing them there's no way they could ever touch you - and if they did, well, that's reason to run off and tell their friends right?

[This is a gameplay prototype only, everything is a placeholder except the (Amazing!) stage music]

Inspiration

Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike, Karateka, Kung Fu (NES), Samurai Blitz, Crypt of the NecroDancer, Guitar Hero, Osu, Samurai Jack

Team
  • Design and art: Karidyas  [tumblr art blog]
  • Coding (Main): Ikuti [twitter]
  • Coding (Support): Tuan
  • Music & Audio: Stepans [itch.io, twitter]
